ModMetaData.name: More Mechanoids
ModMetaData.author: Orion, JoeysLucky22
ModMetaData.description:
A new mechanical threat has risen!
Features: - Crawler - Skullywag - Flamebot - Mammoth - Assaulter - Charge stations - Converting crawlers, scythers, centipedes and skullywags to useful helpers using the machining bench
